resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106406</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106406</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Central Vermont: Explore History in the Heart of the Green Mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zentrales Vermont: Erforschen Sie Geschichte
im Inneren der grünen Berge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Vermontn Central : Explorez l'histoire au
coeur des montagnes vertes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vermont Central: Explore o history no 
coração das montanhas verdes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Vermont Centrale: Esplori la storia nel 
cuore delle montagne verdi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεντρικό Βερμόντ: Ερευνήστε την ιστορία στην 
καρδιά των πράσινων βουνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vermont Central: Explore la historia en el 
corazón de las montañas verdes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores Central Vermont's history using 43 historic places that recall past eras when numerous small villages grew slowly until the coming of the railroad, which resulted in a period of rapid growth for Vermont in the last half of the 19th century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht Geschichte zentralen Vermonts mit 43 
historischen Plätzen, die hinter Ären wiederaufrufen, als zahlreiche
kleine Dörfer langsam bis das Kommen der Eisenbahn wuchsen, die eine 
Periode des schnellen Wachstums für Vermont zur Hälfte letzte des 
19. Jahrhunderts ergab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore l'histoire du Vermontn central en 
utilisant 43 endroits historiques qui se rappellent après des ères 
où les nombreux petits villages se sont développés lentement 
jusqu'à venir du chemin de fer, qui a eues comme conséquence une 
période de croissance rapide pour le Vermontn dans la dernière 
moitié du 19ème siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora o history de Vermont central usando 43 
lugares historic que recordam após as eras em que as vilas pequenas 
numerosas cresceram lentamente até a vinda da estrada de ferro, que 
resultou em um período do crescimento rápido para Vermont ao último
meio do 1ø século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora la storia del Vermont centrale usando 43 
posti storici che ricordano oltre le ere in cui i piccoli villaggi 
numerosi si sono sviluppati lentamente fino a venire della ferrovia, 
che ha provocato un periodo di sviluppo veloce per il Vermont 
nell'ultima metà del diciannovesimo secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά την ιστορία του κεντρικού Βερμόντ 
χρησιμοποιώντας 43 ιστορικές θέσεις που υπενθυμίζουν τις 
προηγούμενες εποχές όταν αυξήθηκαν αργά τα πολυάριθμα μικρά 
χωριά μέχρι τον ερχομό του σιδηροδρόμου, ο οποίος οδήγησε σε μια
περίοδο ταχείας ανάπτυξης για το Βερμόντ στο τελευταίο μισό του 
19$ου αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora la historia de Vermont central usando 43 
lugares históricos que recuerden más allá de las eras en que las 
aldeas pequeñas numerosas crecieron lentamente hasta venir del 
ferrocarril, que dio lugar a un período del crecimiento rápido para 
Vermont en la última mitad del diecinueveavo siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106406</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/central-vermont-explore-history-in-the-heart-of-the-green-mountains</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
